summary: Eldicashyn is an ancient world, filled with elves, orcs, and humans. Within the world lies 7 continents, each with its own culture and wonders. Technology varies; some areas retain only primitive customs, while some practice an aetherpunk approach. The main form of currency in the world is gold, making the flow of goods and services much easier. Two moons backlight the night sky, and an ancient war has been waged for eons between the Demon King and the Church. It is a world of beauty and secrets, constantly changing and curling in on itself. Eldicashyn is a world of boundless possibility and endless adventure.
name: Eldicashyn

locations.name: Glassport

characters.name: Borick Runsul
characters.summary: Borick is a burly human male living in the city of Glassport. At a statuesque height, with bald, wavy red hair and upturned red eyes, he espouses a courageous and imposing presence. Despite his Herculean strength, Borick is clumsy and awkward with a foolish and ignorant demeanor. His favorite color is red, idealistic in his desires to explore a world of boundless possibility and endless adventure.

characters.name: Joramy
characters.summary: Joramy is a nonbinary orc from the ancient world of Eldicashyn. They have long, curly green hair, almond-shaped brown eyes, and a medium stature. Despite their awkward charisma, Joramy is incredibly intelligent and possesses righteous strength and indomitable constitution. Joramy grew up in Glassport, a Metropolis-level city known for its aetherpunk-style technology, and is known for their adventurous spirit and love of the vibrant Eldicashyn night sky.Their favorite color is yellow.
characters.initialMessage: Hello, my name is Joramy. It's nice to meet you!
characters.closingMessage: It was wonderful talking with you. Goodbye!

locations.summary: Nestled atop a tropical coral reef in Eldicashyn, Glassport is a Metropolis-level city with an unsave safety rating. It is known to be one of the oldest cities in the world, with its history dating back to the days of the Demon War, and is made up of a diverse population of humans, elves, and orcs. Despite its dangerous reputation, Glassport has its fair share of lower-middle-class citizens, and the city is often regarded for its aetherpunk-style technology. A vibrant night sky is illuminated by the two moons, and a crystal-clear sea can be seen all around the cityscape, providing an endless backdrop of beauty, mystery, and adventure.

locations.name: The Ash Woods
locations.summary: The Ash Woods are a temperate forest settlement located far to the north of Eldicashyn, spread out amongst a vast expanse of forests and plains. This area is home to a large population, with a combination of Elves, Humans, and Orcs living together peacefully. It is well known for its very safe atmosphere, with a wealth level that sits in the upper-middle class of other settlements. The Ash Woods are steeped in a long history that stretches far back into the dawn of time, where it was once a thriving cultural and trading hub that held a deep reverence and connection with nature and the idea of natural power and growth. Pray to the gods in the windy woods, and they will answer in the form of riches beyond your wildest dreams. The Ash Woods are a place of boundless possibility and endless adventure.

paths.name: Lucky Path
paths.summary: The Lucky Path is an ideal way to connect the bustling city of Glassport with the tranquil expanse of The Ash Woods. Taking an estimated 3 days to travel, the Lucky Path is perfect for explorers longing for a bit of adventure. Starting at the top of the tropical coral reef, travelers will make their way along an uncertain and ever-changing route. The night skies will be brilliant as the two moons light up the way, while exotic wildlife and unexpected obstacles may present their own surprises. Winding through the jungle, mountain passes, and vast plains, the Lucky Path is sure to provide an unpredictable journey that builds to a grand finale. As day 3 comes to a close, travelers will find themselves at the edge of the majestic Ash Woods, ready to explore and uncover all of the secrets and treasures that lie within. Start your journey today with the Lucky Path!
